main event: On 6 September 1964, Mrs. Mildred Schwartz observed a bright red-orange light hovering over her backyard in Glassboro, New Jersey.
interesting points: The object was described as round with no visible fins or tail., Mrs. Schwartz observed the object for approximately 2-3 minutes., The object moved rapidly east before disappearing., Mr. and Mrs. Joseph Tantum also reported seeing a silver colored object approximately 30 feet in diameter hovering near Barrens Pond., The police received multiple reports of bright lights in the sky that night and collected soil samples from an area where an object had previously hovered.
sighted object: bright red-orange light and silver colored object
witness description: Mrs. Mildred Schwartz and Mr. and Mrs. Joseph Tantum
